name: BME 22L
title: Foundations of Design and Experimentation in Molecular Biology, Part I
description: Project-based laboratory course providing hands-on training in fundamental molecular biology and biomolecular engineering techniques used to manipulate expression of DNA and proteins in prokaryotic cells. Students are introduced to essential processes in experimental design.

conditions.restricted_to_majors: bioengineering, bioinformatics, and biomolecular engineering and bioinformatics majors and proposed majors.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): BME 21L. Enrollment is restricted to bioengineering, bioinformatics, and biomolecular engineering and bioinformatics majors and proposed majors.

class_notes: Enroll in lecture and associated secondary lab
